page.title: 10HOME LIFE-A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: My name is {Scott Cavill}and I am 10 years old. I live at{38 Cleavelands}. My Father works for{Radio Rentals}and my Mother is a{Housewife}. I wake up at 7.30 a.m. and have a wash and get dressed before breakfast. I like to have toast and tea for breakfast. I pack my lunch bag and then eat a packet of crisps while I watch B.B.C. Breakfast time. At 8.30 a.m. I leave for school. When I get to school I play in the playground until the whistle goes at 9.00 a.m. We have morning prayers followed by registration and mathematics and English. I eat a packed lunch during the midday break. In the afternoon we have P.E.,games, singing, geography, history, art, craft, science etc. At 3.40 p.m. I go home. In the evening I play with my friends or watch television and go to bed at 10.00 p.m.
